snippet: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web each day for important and peculiar items. Monday's selection includes items on drones, data scientists, an Apple factory and a little bit of tech nostalgia.
abstract: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web each day for important and peculiar items. Monday's selection includes items on drones, data scientists, an Apple factory and a little bit of tech nostalgia.

headline.main: Today's Scuttlebot: Rescuers and a Hot Tech Job
